PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

INSERT
	{ 	?dataset dcat:landingPage ?page }
WHERE
	{ 	?dataset a dcat:Dataset .
		?dataset dcterms:title ?title .
		BIND (
			IRI(
				CONCAT("https://opendata.vlaanderen.be/dataset/", 
					SUBSTR(
						REPLACE(
							REPLACE(
								REPLACE(
									LCASE(?title), 
									'[,:\\/()]', ''), 
								' - ', '-'),
							'[ \\.]', '-'), 
					1, 95)
					)
				)
		as ?page) 
	}
